text: Conchata Galen Ferrell (March 28, 1943 - October 12, 2020) was an American actress. She was best known for playing Berta the housekeeper for all twelve seasons of the sitcom Two and a Half Men. For her role, she received two Primetime Emmy Award nominations (in 2005 and 2007). Ferrell was born in Loudendale, West Virginia. She died on October 12, 2020 after a cardiac arrest at her home in Sherman Oaks, Los Angeles at the age of 77. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Drama Desk Award winners Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from West Virginia Category:People from Charleston, West Virginia
title: Conchata Ferrell
